actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to extend the veterans cost-of-instruction payments program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Veterans Cost-of-Instruction Extension Act - Extends for thirty-nine months (until September 30, 1978) the veterans cost-of-instruction program under the Higher Education Act. Requires a report for each fiscal year by institutions assisted under such Act to the Commissioner of Education on such programs. Requires the Commission to appoint a head of an identifiable administrative unit, directly responsible to the Commission, to carry out functions related to such programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to extend the veterans cost-of-instruction payments program, and for other purposes.
